title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 507.13 - Publication of results
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 507.13 - Publication of results

State Regulations

Within 10 days of the transfer of CO
2
allowances provided for under section
507.11
of this Part, the authority
shall publish on the CO
2
allowance auction website the
auction clearing price and the total amount of allowances sold in such
auction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
507.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
